column4: That person is always getting the excess flood thing.  I'll bet they're trying to spam somewhere...

OH OH OH I now know that it's not my ubuntu install that's doing the restarts!!!!  It just restarted while I was in the livecd session!  I'm gonna pull out that internal drive and see if maybe that is what's making the system restart like it does.
or they're trying to join channels too quickly, which is much more likey.
alternate CDs aren't live cds, no.
